name: DoubleDotDetector
introduction: Detection of Doubledots using Viola-Jones Algorithm

sections.title: Goal of the project
sections.content: You can generate and prepare data containing doubledots to train the Viola-Jones Algorithm, with which you can detect them in pictures. This project is in cooperation with the University of Oxford.

sections.title: Future
sections.content: In the future, we're working on scalable stages in the Viola-Jones Algorithm.
